headline: Institutional Investors See PACCAR Positioned For Cyclical Recovery And Regulation Shifts
summary: Institutional investors recently highlighted PACCAR as a key positive contributor in their portfolios. Madison Investments pointed to signs of improving end markets for PACCAR, including tariff relief and evolving environmental regulations. Expectations of a cyclical recovery in PACCAR’s core markets were cited as part of the constructive outlook. PACCAR, traded as NasdaqGS:PCAR, is drawing fresh attention after being identified as a top contributor by institutional investors. With the...

headline: Here’s Why PACCAR (PCAR) is Improving
summary: Madison Investments, an investment advisor, released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter for the “Madison Large Cap Fund”. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the fourth quarter, the S&P 500 returned 2.65%, resulting in a full-year return of 17.9% for 2025. Over the last three years, the Index has achieved annual growth of […]
